introduce.title: Kirill Shevtsov
introduce.para1: Frontend Developer with over 6 years of experience creating web applications and websites of different complexities. Skilled in building cross-browser, responsive, and accessible interfaces using modern JavaScript frameworks.
introduce.para2: Familiar with UI/UX best practices, performance optimization, and maintaining clean, scalable code. Comfortable working independently or as part of a distributed team, with a practical approach to solving problems. Looking for a long-term, full-time remote role to contribute to meaningful projects and continue growing professionally.

firstWebSite.name: First Website
firstWebSite.excerpt: My first website, created as a personal project. It may look naive now, but I still love this work.
firstWebSite.excerpt1: My very first website — a small personal project. It feels a bit naive today, but it carries the spark that started my journey into web development.
firstWebSite.excerpt2: This was my very first website. Simple and a little rough around the edges, but it marks the beginning of everything I’ve built since.
firstWebSite.excerpt3: My first-ever website. Naive in style, but full of the passion that pushed me forward.
firstWebSite.description: My very first website created as a personal project.
